name: Hidden Objects Thanksgiving Fall Harvest Puzzle
name_original: Hidden Objects Thanksgiving Fall Harvest Puzzle
description:
Hidden Objects – Thanksgiving Harvest is an artistically crafted Seek & Find game with 30+ gorgeous Autumn Season levels. 100’s of Objects to Find!

Explore Fall’s magic by seeing Autumn Foliage, Thanksgiving Harvests, Pumpkin Patches, Forests and Creeks, Apple Orchards, Scenic Autumn Lakes, Rustic Barns, Cornfields, Halloween and more! Give THANKS!

Find festive Autumn themed objects like Turkeys, Pumpkins, Acorns, yellow, green and orange Autumn Leaves, Candy Corn, Scarecrows, Ghosts, Halloween decorations, Indian Corn, Gourds, Hayrides, Pumpkin Patches and more!

Levels vary from easy to difficult. A fun, object quest challenge for Hidden Object, Puzzle, Spot the Difference, Brain & Word fans!

This Brain Challenging Adventure through Fall season is sure to entertain!

Hidden Objects – Thanksgiving Harvest features:
Gorgeous, Crisp Fall & Autumn Graphics
3 Game Modes- Traditional, Chill, Adventure
Exciting Levels/Scenes of Hidden Object Puzzles
Artistically Crafted Levels
Zoom to Find Objects
Find Objects by Picture, Word, or Collector
Challenge Scenes with Missing Letters, Scrambled Words and Bonus Objects
Timed Challenges and Hints
Drag Scene to Search


Game Modes instructions:
TRADITIONAL-
Time limits
Hint limits
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

CHILL-
Time unlimited
Hints unlimited
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

ADVENTURE-
Time limits
Hint limits
Bonus Bonanza (words highlighted in green)
Missing Letters, Scrambled Words, Word Finder
15 Unique Levels
